tool.name: parallel assign taxonomy blast
tool.command:
#if str($blast_db) != 'None': uncompress_tgz.py -i $blast_db -o blast_db; BLAST_DB_NAME=`get_blast_db_path.py -i blast_db`; #end if parallel_assign_taxonomy_blast.py -i $input_fasta_fp -o parallel_assign_taxonomy_blast_output #if str($reference_seqs_fp) != 'None': -r $reference_seqs_fp #end if
#if str($blast_db) != 'None': -b \$BLAST_DB_NAME #end if
#if $e_value: -e $e_value #end if
#if $jobs_to_start: -O $jobs_to_start #end if
#if $retain_temp_files: -R #end if
#if $poll_directly: -T #end if
#if $suppress_polling: -W #end if
#if str($job_prefix): -X $job_prefix #end if
#if $seconds_to_sleep: -Z $seconds_to_sleep #end if
#if str($id_to_taxonomy_fp) != 'None': -t $id_to_taxonomy_fp #end if ; compress_path.py -i parallel_assign_taxonomy_blast_output -o $output_dir

param.label: -r/--reference_seqs_fp: Ref seqs to blast against. Must provide either --blast_db or --reference_seqs_db for assignment with blast [default: /home/kevin/qiime_software/gg_otus-13_8-release/rep_set/97_otus.fasta]
param.name: reference_seqs_fp

param.label: -b/--blast_db: Database to blast against. Must provide either --blast_db or --reference_seqs_db for assignment with blast [default: None]
param.name: blast_db

param.label: -e/--e_value: Maximum e-value to record an assignment, only used for blast method [default: 0.001]
param.name: e_value

param.label: -R/--retain_temp_files: retain temporary files after runs complete (useful for debugging) [default: False]
param.name: retain_temp_files

param.label: -T/--poll_directly: Poll directly for job completion rather than running poller as a separate job. If -T is specified this script will not return until all jobs have completed. [default: False]
param.name: poll_directly

param.label: -W/--suppress_polling: suppress polling of jobs and merging of results upon completion [default: False]
param.name: suppress_polling

param.label: -X/--job_prefix: job prefix [default: descriptive prefix + random chars]
param.name: job_prefix

param.label: -Z/--seconds_to_sleep: Number of seconds to sleep between checks for run completion when polling runs [default: 60]
param.name: seconds_to_sleep

param.label: -t/--id_to_taxonomy_fp: full path to id_to_taxonomy mapping file [default: /home/kevin/qiime_software/gg_otus-13_8-release/taxonomy/97_otu_taxonomy.txt]
param.name: id_to_taxonomy_fp

tool.help: This script performs like the assign_taxonomy.py script, but is intended to make use of multicore/multiprocessor environments to perform analyses in parallel. Mapping of sequence identifiers to taxonomy and quality scores.
